tool_description: Calculates angular relationships (aspects) between celestial bodies, including major and minor aspects with orb tolerances.

planetary_positions.description: Array of planetary positions in degrees

planet_names.description: Array of planet/point names corresponding to positions

major_aspects_only.description: Calculate only major aspects (conjunction, opposition, trine, square, sextile)

include_minor_aspects.description: Include minor aspects (semi-sextile, quincunx, semi-square, sesquiquadrate)

separating_applying.description: Distinguish between separating and applying aspects

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: planetary_positions and planet_names arrays must have the same length.
Invalid orb tolerance: Orb tolerance must be between 1 and 10 degrees.
Invalid position: All planetary positions must be between 0 and 360 degrees.
Insufficient data: At least 2 planetary positions required for aspect calculation.
Invalid planet names: Planet names cannot be empty strings.
usage: Provide planetary_positions array with corresponding planet_names. Optionally specify aspect types, orb_tolerance, and analysis preferences. Returns detailed aspect analysis.

aspects_found.description: Array of aspect descriptions (e.g., 'Sun conjunct Moon 2Â°15')
